titleStmt.title: A letter to Mr. T.H. late minister: now fugitiue: from Sir Edvvard Hoby Knight. In answere of his first Motiue
titleStmt.author: Hoby, Edward, Sir, 1560-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F[elix] K[ingston] for Ed. Blount and W. Barret, and are to be sold at the signe of the blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Higgons, Theophilus. First motive of T.H. Maister of Arts, and lately minister, to suspect the integrity of his religion.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
